about_the_game:
- Prologue -

Orchi, a young snail-girl, wakes up in the middle of nowhere. Completely lost, she decides to roam around, looking for a way home. Luckily, she has her mallet ready for battle. However, not everything goes to plan.

- Features -

  • A unique cast of characters!
  • A Vibrant, varied world with unique environments!
  • Unlockable abilities!
  • Weapon upgrades!
  • Build variety!
  • Special bossfights!
  • Multiple endings!

- Find powerful trinkets -


She might not look like it, but orchi loves to collect the diverse trinkets! You gotta work for them though! Maybe there's one hidden behind a breakable wall, through a ceiling or maybe as a reward from a familiar face!

- Assemble and combine! -


Combine shiny trinkets and abilities to create cool builds to use for exploration, secret hunting, or even for KO'ing foes!

- Your adventure, your playstyle -


Slug Gear has a high focus on build-variety and is open for different playstyles! Whether you want to be a combo maniac, a summoner or a stance user, all is fair game!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E5200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10-capable GPUs
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Slug Gear is an action-packed Metroidvania within a universe of insect-human hybrids. Collect unique trinkets, fight powerful bosses and discover the lost lore of the world!
